a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Average farm size vs. GDP per capita, 2000
GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and for differences in living costs between countries.
Data source: Lowder et al. (2016); Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank (2025)

Note: GDP per capita is expressed in
international-$
at 2021 prices.
